metadata.description: Action, romance, and historical intrigue help make Nobuhiro Watsuki's  Rurouni Kenshin, the tale of a wandering swordsman set against the backdrop of the Meiji Restoration, one of the most popular Shonen Jump titles among fans to date. Himura Kenshin, once an assassin (or  hitokiri ) of ferocious power, now fights to protect the honor of those in need.
metadata.name: Rurouni Kenshin
